description: In this tutorial, we show how to calculate and visualize the electronic band structure using our Web Interface, for the simple case of crystalline silicon.
title: Exabyte.io Tutorial: Calculate Band Structure

youTubeCaptions.text: Create a simulation, by navigating to the job designer page.
Then, <break time='0.5' /> open the workflow tab, and choose the 'Band Structure' workflow by selecting it in the list. This workflow can be imported from the bank, if it is not already listed.
After that, <break time='0.5' /> navigate to compute tab, and set compute configuration. Here, we use one node with four cores.
Then, <break time='0.5' /> set the name for the job. Here, we call it - Silicon Band Structure.
Next, <break time='0.5' /> save the job. <break time='3.0' /> It can then be selected and submitted to the compute queue, for execution. <break time='4.0' />
The status of the calculation will, accordingly, change from submitted, to active.  Please wait, until the job has finished running. <break time='5.0' />
When the job is finished, open it, to inspect the final results. <break time='4.0' />
The band structure dispersion plot can be found, at the bottom of the results page.
